children.value: Welcome! There is alot going on here, so, buckle up.  A little about me, im a tech enthusiast, tinkering addict, and loveer of all things that can compute.  So here you will find a very wide variety of tom foolery.  I hope you enjoy!
Raspberry Pi Builds / Riviting Blog Content
Mobile App Dev / ai / Home Automation

props.:content: ["conda activate cojovi_home_moat","pip3 install speechrecognition","docker start the_hot_box","npm run away never"]

children.value: Edit your theme content and appearance with live-preview within
Use built-in components (or your own!) inside your content.
Enjoy the ease and simplicity of Markdown and discover
. Choose between static generation, on-demand rendering (Node) or edge-side rendering on
Customize the whole design, or add components using slots - you can make Docus your own.
Your new favorite way to build

contents.title: Project Structure
contents.description: Docus is a Nuxt theme that provides a ready-to-use documentation website, if you are familiar with Nuxt, you will feel right at home.

children.value: Docus is a Nuxt theme that provides a ready-to-use documentation website, if you are familiar with Nuxt, you will feel right at home.
This is the minimal directory structure to get an up and running Docus website.
to fit your branding and design.

contents.title: Writing Pages
contents.description: Docus is made to let you write all your content in Markdown and Vue components with the MDC syntax.

children.value: Docus is made to let you write all your content in Markdown and Vue components with the MDC syntax.
folder will be mapped to a route.
Docus supports multiple Front-matter attributes for pages.
